verses.name: Psalms 119:136
verses.text: Rivers of waters run down mine eyes, because they keep not thy law.

verses.name: Psalms 119:137
verses.text: Righteous art thou, O Lord, and upright are thy judgments.

verses.name: Psalms 119:138
verses.text: Thy testimonies that thou hast commanded are righteous and very faithful.

verses.name: Psalms 119:139
verses.text: My zeal hath consumed me, because mine enemies have forgotten thy words.

verses.name: Psalms 119:140
verses.text: Thy word is very pure: therefore thy servant loveth it.

verses.name: Psalms 119:141
verses.text: I am small and despised: yet do not I forget thy precepts.

verses.name: Psalms 119:142
verses.text: Thy righteousness is an everlasting righteousness, and thy law is the truth.

verses.name: Psalms 119:143
verses.text: Trouble and anguish have taken hold on me: yet thy commandments are my delights.
